data.name: Scribble It!
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR OFFICIAL DISCORD COMMUNITY


About the Game

Explore Countless Words


You already played through all of our official word packages? Don't worry, there's a lot more to explore. New word packages made by our amazing community enter the world of Scribble It! every day and are at your disposal immediately!

Intuitive Controls and Advanced Tools


Most of the time a brush and some color is all you need. But sometimes more advanced tools are necessary to create true works of art.
In both cases we got you covered. Our toolbar offers the most important tools and makes them accessible in an intuitive way. But more sophisticated tools are just one click away - for when you really need them!

Twitch.tv - Cooperate with your Viewers


Team up with your audience and play against other streamers or your friends in Stream Wars! or let your viewers be your hardest critic in Exhibition Wars!. Viewers can choose words, make guesses and rate your scribbles! The Twitch.tv integration enables you to interact with your audience in totally new ways.

Play in Teams


Draw a single picture with multiple people! All of our game modes can be played in teams. Invite your best friends and compete against other teams! Coordination and teamplay can lead to exceptional drawings and victory against your opponents but a lack of those mean a sure path to chaos for you and your team.




"IM A GOD AT THIS GAME!"

- CouRage

"Please don't guess it ... OH FUCK HE GUESSED IT!!!"

- VanossGaming

"They are gonna call me Raecasso"

- Valkyrae

"this game is so fun, i played this with my dad and had the best time of our lives"

- Steam User

data.short_description: Adrenaline fueled, fast paced drawing action. Draw fast, guess faster and win it all! THOUSANDS of official words in 17 different languages. 4 multiplayer game modes with up to 16 players and a singleplayer mode. We take you back to the heated pictionary games everyone had in school!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Romanian, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Swedish, Finnish, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese
data.reviews:
“Scribble It! is a fun and exciting drawing game that we all know and love. Perfect game if you want to have fun with friends and family. It really is worth being picked up!”
GamingTaylor

“The title says it all - just scribble it. Several modes of play, integration with Twitch.tv and simple adding of your own packages with words allowed us to spend some very pleasant evenings.”
rozgrywka podcast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32-/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 400 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 4000 with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon 200 Series with 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal compatible graphics card is required.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal compatible graphics card is required.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 5000 with 512MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon 200 Series with 1024MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.
